type: Legendary Creature – Human Advisor Mercenary Lord
rules_text:
[i]Crest of Flames[/i] – Whenever Byleth, The Instructor attacks, put a +1/+1 counter onto each legendary attacking creature. 
[i]Divine Pulse[/i] – When Byleth, The Instructor enters, if she was cast, take an extra turn after this one.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three other legendary creatures, transform Byleth
